mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum,food_no, food_name, food_content, recipe_img from foodinfo cross join (select recipe_img from recipe where recipe_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by recipe_readcount) where food_name =#{keyword}) where rnum =1 order by food_no
select food_name from (select rownum rnum, food_name from foodinfo where food_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ) where rnum=1
